title: desktop client sync larger files fails
body:
i have problem with the syncronization of large file

this is an example of the log of client sync:

04-05 15:43:24:940 _csync_push_file: remote repository atomar push enabled for owncloud://192.168.200.10/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/clientsync/reporting2012/skmbt_c25212041308070.pdf (0).
04-05 15:43:24:940 oc_module: => open called for owncloud://192.168.200.10/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/clientsync/reporting2012/skmbt_c25212041308070.pdf
04-05 15:43:24:940 oc_module: stating directory owncloud://192.168.200.10/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/clientsync/reporting2012
04-05 15:43:24:940 oc_module: dir owncloud://192.168.200.10/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/clientsync/reporting2012 is there, we know it already.
04-05 15:43:24:940 oc_module: put request on /owncloud/remote.php/webdav/clientsync/reporting2012/skmbt_c25212041308070.pdf!
04-05 15:43:24:940 oc_module: sendfile handling request type put.
04-05 15:43:24:940 oc_module: put file size: 2435947, variable sizeof: 8
04-05 15:43:55:127 oc_module: neon error code was 6
04-05 15:43:55:127 oc_module: sendfile request failed with http status 0!
04-05 15:43:55:127 _csync_push_file: file: c:/users/marco/owncloud/reporting2012/skmbt_c25212041308070.pdf, command: sendfile, error: input/output error from errno 5

client sync is installed on win7 64bit
server is on a lamp virtual appliance based on debian linux 6.0 (virtualized on virtual box in a server ubuntu 8.04)
owncloud 5.0.3
client 1.2.3-niglhtly20130405
